events.message: I recently purchased a blender from your store but I want to request a refund because it does not work as expected.
The case has been categorized under 'Refund' based on the customer's request for money back.
An agent from the refunds team has been assigned to handle this refund request.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you want to request a refund for your blender. I'm here to assist you with that.
Could you please provide the order number and the reason you want to return the blender?
The order number is 987654. The blender stopped working after just two uses, which is disappointing.
Thank you for the information. We can process a full refund for your blender once we receive it back. I will send you the return shipping label shortly.
Thanks for the quick response! I appreciate your help and will send the blender back as soon as I get the label.
The return label was sent, and your refund will be processed once the product is received at our warehouse.
We wanted to follow up to ensure you received the refund for your returned blender. Please let us know if there is anything else we can assist with.
As the refund has been successfully completed, we are now closing this support case. Thank you for shopping with us.
